import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import "./styles.css"; import Breadcrumb from '../../../../../../../../../layout/breadcrumb' import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardFooter, CardHeader, Media, Form, FormGroup, Input, Button, Label } from "reactstrap" import axios from 'axios' import Sheet from 'react-modal-sheet'; const PaymentFullPaneManageAndPay = ({ currentApplication, paymentPaneFull, setFullPaymentPaneOpen }) => { return ( setFullPaymentPaneOpen(false)}>

Make a complete payment/deposit for {currentApplication !== null ? `Make a full deposit/payment to this contractor (${currentApplication.applicantName})` : "Loading Name/Data..."} before they can proceed with the required work on this contract..
); } export default PaymentFullPaneManageAndPay;
